This is the most AWESOME shirt!! I have purchased it in 3 colors and it is great for just about anything.  It is girly and soft, but thick enough to wear in cooler weather with a sweater or jacket.  No ironing and easy care.  I am a teacher and this works so well for me.  I get compliments every time I wear one of them.  Probably my favorite teacher wardrobe purchase.

I’m often skeptical of purchasing a brand of clothing I’m not familiar with, on Amazon, because you do often end of getting some weird polyester material or Lycra. However, this blouse is a nice material, and not itchy, even where it’s gathered/smocked. The sleeves are nicely puffy, so you can easily dress it up or down.
It's cute, stretchy, comfy. .

I ordered this shirt in a size small and it was still way to big to wear. I feel like the sleeves are way to big and puffy and the rest of the shirt is a little too oversized. Not very flattering on either because of the overly oversized look too. The shirt is also slightly see through as well. But I will say that the pattern is super cute.
Lovely shirt, pretty pattern and color. Nice material! Roomy fit!

I originally ordered this shirt as a dressy blouse to wear for work and ended up not liking it. I would've kept this shirt if it wasn't for the sleeves. The puffy sleeves have a harsh elastic that irritated my arms and I feel would be uncomfortable to wear all day. I tried to get over the sleeves because the design of the shirt itself is cute, but couldn't get past it, so I ended up returning the shirt.
This is a super cute shirt, but the neck is a little wide. Still kept it.

Bought it for a baby shower and I’m so glad I did. It’s too cute. I’m between a M/L but I went with the L, and am happy with that choice. However, I think the M would have fit too, just  a little more fitted at the waist/hips. The sleeves aren’t uncomfortable, the fabric feel was as expected, and the bottom of the shirt is nice enough that it doesn’t require being tucked in. Easy to dress up or down. I’ll probably go back for one of the purples for spring/summer.

I read some mixed reviews on this top & wasn’t sure if it would be a good fit for me. I am so glad I bought it. It’s cute, flattering, comfortable & easy to dress up or down. I will be ordering in another color! Cute with jeans or white pants.
Such a cute and sweet shirt! Great to dress up or down. Color is spring vibes.
I love this shirt. Bought a second one in a different color.
Flattering top.  True to size.  Happy with purchase
